thread.section_title: Splendid Etoile Hotel - UPDATED 2016 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect hotel for the weekend
thread.title_full: Perfect hotel for the weekend - Review of Splendid Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Rahman R
title: Perfect hotel for the weekend
text:
My husband and I had spent the weekend in Paris to celebrate my birthday and stayed at this very pleasant hotel which boasts large and very clean rooms with fantastic views on the Arc. It was a pleasure to come back to our room following our first day of sightseeing and exploring. Would definitely recommend, the front counter staff were also very informative and advised us of what prices to expect for taxi fares to and from the station.
Room Tip: Request a room with a view See more room tips
